text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Morita was born in Takatsuki on May 10, 1995. After graduating from Ryutsu Keizai University, he joined J1 League club Kawasaki Frontale in 2018. He played many matches as defensive midfielder from first season. Kawasaki also won the J1 champions in 2018 and 2020. In January 2021, he moved to Portuguese Primeira Liga club Santa Clara. On September 11, 2018, Morita debuted for the Japan national team against Costa Rica.
